ygData.subject: Re: Seeking advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, it s like eating spaghetti all the time. Sooner or later, you just get tired of it. Let s feed the dragon some grapes. *grins evilly at Mystix*
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:32 PM 1/14/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>and all this time i thought you *LIKED* being made dragon food (;
>
><pokes ilystil>

Well, it's like eating spaghetti all the time. Sooner or later, you just
get tired of it.

Let's feed the dragon some grapes.

*grins evilly at Mystix*

=Ilystil Drakonblayde <Emef`Aitch> / The Blade of Tunare
=Level 50 Lady Ranger of the Rathe / ilystil@...
===========================================================
'Ye have enemies? Good, good. That means ye've stood up
for something, sometime in thy life.' - Elminster
